this_title: National Geographic Naked Science Iceland Volcano Eruption
trans_title: 国家地理: 科学新发现 冰岛火山爆发
introduction: Iceland's Eyjafjallajokull volcano erupted April 14, 2010, spewing aircraft-harming ash over most of Europe. It could cause Katla, its neighboring, larger volcano to erupt. NGC looks at Eyjafjallajokull before, during and after, explaining the science behind the chaos and the biggest disruption of air traffic since 9/11.
chinese_title: 国家地理: 科学新发现 冰岛火山爆发
foreign_title: National Geographic Naked Science Iceland Volcano Eruption
